title: Radiant Baseboard Heat, Package Acceptance, Late Fee Forgiveness
posting_body: ['Huntington House’s plush, landscaped courtyards with two community pools, walking paths, sundecks, barbecues and picnic tables welcomes residents with the perfect environment to call “home”.', 'Each apartment offers spacious floor plans, beautiful views of the courtyards and private entry.', 'Located on Fort Street enjoy Huntington House’s neighborhood charm in the city.', 'We would love for you to come on by and see what Huntington House has to offer!', '-Air Conditioned', '-Upgraded Units Available', '-Sparkling Clean Swimming Pool', '-One $35 Application Fee Per Apartment, Not Per Person', '-Package Acceptance', '-Late Fee Forgiveness', '-No Security Deposit Required', '-BBQ & Picnic Area', '-Picture Windows with Courtyard Views', '-Additional Storage', '-Online Payment Options (Credit Card, Debit Card and ACH)', '-Radiant Baseboard Heat', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
